wordGroup: insight into 深刻理解，洞察…
gain an insight into 看透， 识破

sentences.en: What is needed is insight into the dynamics of the social system.
sentences.cn: 所需要的就是对社会制度反动力的洞悉。

sentences.en: He was a man of forceful character, with considerable insight and diplomatic skills.
sentences.cn: 他是个性格坚强的人，有着非凡的洞察力和交际手腕。

sentences.en: In business, his greatest skills were his insight and his management ability.
sentences.cn: 在商业上，他最大的技能是他的洞察力和管理能力。
